page.title: 11Adult Societies,Gotherington
page.content: In Gotherington there are lots of activities for adults.One of them is called The Recreational Club.The Recreational Club organise all village things like fetes,sports-days and horse shows.They raise money for the village. The Tritons Club sometimes put on plays or pantomimes which are chosen by the members.Everyone says what they think would be a suitable play to act.They rehearse for about two months and then they perform it on the Village Hall's stage.It is usually very good.Another club is called Winemakers. Winemakers make wine and they go away to lots of places but they don't do anything really exciting.One activity for ladies is called Wives.At Wives they arrange things like baby sitters for people who are going out,they also have a lot of jumble sales.
